h1.span: March 30th Update on KCISD School CLosure

span.span: Kirbyville CISD schools will extend closure of all campuses until further notice in an effort to support the community, region, and nation's need to slow the spread of COVID-19. This action follows advice from local, state and national health authorities.
The health of students and employees is a top priority for the District and we are in communication with local and state officials as we continue to monitor the situation.
We wish to thank our entire community of families, staff, and community partners for your patience and support during these uncertain times.

div.script: stLight.options({ publisher: "ddb4fa0a-d941-46b8-b9b6-a5d72fd54589", doNotHash: false, doNotCopy: false, hashAddressBar: true });
